item.title: Inspectrum with SigMF Files
item.description: This post is as much a note to myself, for the next time that I hit this issue, which is installing Inspectrum with SigMF support. The tool I’m installing is Inspectrum which is for analysing captured files of sampled data, primarily from Software Defined Radios. This allows for looking at signals, and analysing what is in the capture. I was looking to use this tool with some SigMF files, the Signal Meta data files are made up of a Binary File containing the sample data, and a JSON companion file, which contains details about the capture.
